entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Entry doesn't use the TextColor property when the Text value is bound after some seconds (iOS) #19509
  • App FlowDirection is restricted to device flow direction and doesn't respond to any changes #19506
  • NullPointer from SearchHandlerAppearanceTracker on iOS #19504
    Backlog
  • [UITest] Include information about device requirements when the visual tests fail #19503
    Backlog
  • On ios, if IsReadOnly is true, the Editor will not be able to scroll #19500
    Backlog
  • Setting Shell.FlyoutWidth causes problems on WinUI with changed values in binding context #19496
    Backlog
  • Button with image does not autosize on iOS when text is changed. #19495
  • Expander resizing preventing user swiping to next item in carousel #19490
    Backlog
  • APT0003 and other errors with new template #19489
  • [Testing] Legacy ported UITest RemoveItemsQuickly fails on iOS #19488
    Backlog
  • [Testing] Legacy ported UITest Issue10300Test fails on iOS #19487
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI project using the PDF.js library - Issue loading the PDF from iOS resource #19486

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix discovering iOS 17 simulators on CI #19501
  • [testing] Enable a way to test on real devices #19492

Merged

  • Fix Clear Button size calculation #19482
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [X] Change the default value for xaml-comp #19390
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Fix main build #19494
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [X] Warn on non compiled bindings #19360
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [ci] Move to new compliance task #19475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.3 #19394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
